radiographic_examinations.findings: Nonspecific, diffuse muscle edema, most prominent in the posterior compartment of the calf, with mild associated contrast enhancement. No evidence of muscle atrophy, myonecrosis, bony involvement, or drainable fluid collections.
Ground-glass opacities in central peribronchial regions, consistent with alveolar hemorrhage.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Chest imaging was not repeated, but he remained without pulmonary symptoms.
